Gloss: to feel cold (because of the weather)
to chew (in order to soften, especially betel)
to climb (a short structure, e.g. a ladder)
meat (animal or fish flesh used as food)
to suck in (e.g. water through a straw)
to work (in a garden or field)
to stand (be in a standing position)
to hit (with a club or stick)
to beat (to make noise; e.g. a drum)
to arrange things; put things in order
to spread open; to open (a book)
to squeeze (as in juice from a fruit)
to open (a mouth, basket, suitcase, etc.)
